item.title: WriteGooder for Sublime Text
item.description: Simple grammar checking for your documentation. Prerequisites: write-gooder and Sublime Package Control Mac OS X: Installing node with homebrew or macports is assumed. The path to write-gooder is hardcoded in this plugin as /usr/local/share/npm/bin:/usr/local/bin:/opt/local/bin. You can change the path to the executable in settings. Linux: Make sure write-gooder is in your environment path. Windows: Installing node with the Windows Installer from nodejs.org is assumed. ##Install write-gooder with npm npm install -g duereg/write-gooder
